resources.string: If your device is not a genuine product, game will not start.\nPlease let us know from an inquiry form at application download page if you are not aware of this issue.
Iniquitous tool(s) has been found. You cannot access the service unless you delete it.

Devices with iniquitous tools are denied access to this service.\nWhen such tools are detected, willl you permit us to collect App data of the tools?
